channel.title: H264 on Gaowan Liang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in H264 on Gaowan Liang's Blog

item.title: A Brief Overview of H.264 Frame Encoding Principles - Intra Prediction and Inter Prediction
item.description: Previously, we discussed some aspects of H.264 encoding in MP4. This time, let’s delve into how H.264 achieves such high compression rates, which brings us to the concepts of intra prediction and inter prediction. After some research, I found that there might not be any other source as detailed as this one, and it contains almost no complex or difficult information—reading this is a gain! (*/ω＼*)
